title: Princess Prefix
subtle: Fantasy (fiction), 89 words, Level F (Grade 1), Lexile 340L, Fiction Series
description: Princess Prefix can do amazing things! What does she do, and how does she do it? Read Princess Prefix to find out how she creates new words using prefixes. The story supports readers by providing colorful illustrations, high-frequency words, and repetitive text. The story can also be used to teach students how to determine cause-and-effect relationships and the proper use of exclamation marks.
meta: confuse, disappear, impossible, nonsense, overload, prefix
Connect to prior knowledge to understand text
Cause and Effect : Determine cause and effect
Exclamatory Sentences : Recognize and use exclamatory sentences
High-Frequency Words : Identify and use the high-frequency word make

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
